text: My son just started J1 and was shocked your teachers DO NOT TEACH. Initially I didnâ€™t believe and I asked him to record the class. Your physics teacher Mr Goh and Chem teacher Wendy Heng do not teach at all. No wonder your school standing keeps going down the drain!

I went for a workshop and it was amazing I had a blast and enjoyed myself. Coding with older people is very fun, I learnt to be confident and learn basic skills from the coding event the students there made me feel very welcome honestly I am very impressed that they are very nice I thought they will be like normal teachers scolding us but there was a lot of laughter although the program is over I would not forget this memorable day thank you to the stem club members for helping me learn how to code it was  a splendid two days of my life I have turn over a new leaf over the two days. CJC yall are amazing!!! ðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜Š

Had my best teenage time here. Class of 2001-2002. SML and bro Paul. After sch orchard everyday. Scott and lido were our canteen. Super fun days. Really missed the good old days. Life is nv the same after jc. Final 2 years of pure fun.

Class of 2020. Covid batch & really appreciated the efforts to transit to HBL seamlessly. Overall, great jc experience if you like the party culture. Glad I made lifelong friends whom are still with me thru uni.
Amazing vibes. Very conducive to study and toilet smells really good!
